channel.title: Item Bugs
channel.description: Hello im having some problems with a few items on my sever this is the items and problems: 1) Infinity gloves - when equipted goes to the sword spot so i cant hold anything. 2) Infinity boots - when equipted goes to the sword spot so i cant hold anything. 3) Mage's book - when equipted goes to the sword spot so i cant hold anything.
